mapper.select: SELECT b.*,c.prodNo,c.thumb1,c.company,c.prodName,a.`count`, a.total from `km_product_order_item` AS a LEFT JOIN `km_product_order` AS b USING(`ordNo`) left JOIN `km_product` AS c ON a.prodNo = c.prodNo WHERE `ordUid`=#{uid} limit 5;
SELECT a.* ,b.c1Name FROM `km_article` AS a JOIN `km_qna_cate` AS b ON a.cate=b.cate WHERE `group`='qna' AND `uid`=#{uid} ORDER BY `no` DESC LIMIT #{start},10;
SELECT a.*,b.prodName FROM `km_product_review` AS a JOIN `km_product` AS b ON a.prodNo=b.prodNo WHERE `uid`=#{uid} ORDER BY `revNo` DESC LIMIT #{start},10;
